nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

ERC20Basic

nodes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
nodes.name: ERC20

nodes.documentation:
@title Atomic exchange to facilitate swaps from ETH or DAI to a token.
Users an oracle bot to update market prices.
nodes.name: Exchange
Exchange

nodes.documentation:
Trades ETH for tokens at ethRate.

     * @param expectedAmountBaseToken Amount of tokens expected to receive.
This prevents front-running race conditions from occurring when ethRate
is updated.
nodes.name: tradeETH

nodes.documentation:
Trades DAI for tokens at daiRate. User must first approve DAI to be
transferred by Exchange.

     * @param amountDAI Amount of DAI to exchange
@param expectedAmountBaseToken Amount of tokens expected to receive.
This prevents front-running race conditions from occurring when daiRate
is updated.
nodes.name: tradeDAI

nodes.documentation:
Calculates exchange amount for ETH to token.

     * @param amountETH Amount of ETH, in base units
nodes.name: calculateAmountForETH

nodes.documentation:
Calculates exchange amount for DAI to token.

     * @param amountDAI Amount of DAI, in base units
nodes.name: calculateAmountForDAI
setETHRate
setDAIRate
withdrawERC20s

nodes.documentation:
Changes the oracle.

     * @param _oracle Address of new oracle
nodes.name: setOracle

nodes.documentation: @notice Owner: Withdraw Ether
nodes.name: withdrawEther

checkRole(address,string).details: reverts if addr does not have role

params.roleName: the name of the role // reverts

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

calculateAmountForDAI(uint256).notice: Calculates exchange amount for DAI to token.

calculateAmountForETH(uint256).notice: Calculates exchange amount for ETH to token.

setDAIRate(uint256,uint256).notice: Sets the exchange rate from ETH to token.

setETHRate(uint256,uint256).notice: Sets the exchange rate from ETH to token.

tradeDAI(uint256,uint256).notice: Trades DAI for tokens at daiRate. User must first approve DAI to be transferred by Exchange.

tradeETH(uint256).notice: Trades ETH for tokens at ethRate.

withdrawERC20s(address,uint256).notice: Recovers DAI, leftover tokens, or other.

params.amountDAI: Amount of DAI, in base units

params.amountETH: Amount of ETH, in base units
